entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain or drizzle this evening and 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
